description: Discover how blockchain audit trails enhance security through immutable and transparent records. Learn about their benefits, industry applications, and the challenges they face in sectors like finance, healthcare, and supply chain management.
keywords: Blockchain, audit trails, security, transparency, immutability, fraud prevention, smart contracts, regulatory compliance, financial services, healthcare, supply chain, voting systems, energy sector
title: Unlocking Transparency: The Role of Blockchain Audit Trails in Modern Security
